kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3001/devel/db/geokrety/move/seed path_url=/devel/db/geokrety/move/seed headers={'Content-Length': '115', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.18.4', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': u'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'} body=gkid=1&move_type=0&author=1&waypoint=GC0001&lat=43.60000&lon=7.00000&comment=Hello&app=robotframework&app_ver=3.2.1

POST Response : url=http://localhost:3001/devel/db/geokrety/move/seed status=200, reason=OK headers={'Content-Length': '92', 'X-XSS-Protection': '1; mode=block', 'X-Content-Type-Options': 'nosniff', 'X-Powered-By': 'Fat-Free Framework', 'Set-Cookie': 'PHPSESSID=474f29dcba32c78757b0bd4573fd3fba; path=/; HttpOnly; SameSite=Lax', 'Expires': 'Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 +0000', 'Keep-Alive': 'timeout=5, max=100', 'Server': 'Apache/2.4.38 (Debian)', 'Connection': 'Keep-Alive', 'Pragma': 'no-cache', 'Cache-Control': 'no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate', 'Date': 'Fri, 27 Nov 2020 22:51:26 GMT', 'X-Frame-Options': 'SAMEORIGIN', 'Content-Type': 'text'} body=Create move id:1 geokret:1 waypoint:GC0001 movetype:0 wpt:GC0001 lat:43.60000 lon:7.00000 OK
